Text:
Are you F*&$ing serious? As of Q3 2012, you're STILL uploading RARs?!? Seriously, go choke on a dick and fucking die. Just fucking STOP. There's no point in uploading RARs anymore, in case you haven't heard.

And yes, I haven't uploaded shit myself, because I registered this account SOLELY to tell YOU AND YOUR ILK to go FIND A FUCKING EMPTY GRASS FIELD AND FUCKING DIE.

Jesus ... at the least, catch up with the last 5 fucking years if filesharing ... FUCK.

P.S. - go fuck yourselves

PPS - and die.

No. Because you're not the king of the world and no one cares what you think.

If you don't like what people give you for FREE, then DON'T DOWNLOAD IT! There, very simple solution for your problem, no more RARs!

P.S. - catch up with the last 30 years of how the scene has worked, and how much it cared what outsiders think.

P.P.S. - if you want people to die because you don't like the format in which they upload a file, you might want to seek some help.
